name: Rules and Regulations Road map – the bigger picture
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description:
Where are we? Where are we going? 
There are several reviews looking at harmonising and simplifying regulations. The Harman review set out to explore how building standards could be harmonised across local authorities and to ensure these requirement didn’t adversely affect the viability of sites. 
Lord Taylor of Gross Moor is undertaking a review to streamline guidance that explains statutory provisions, planning and the planning system. Building Regulations are also under review, including the 2013 revision to Part L and there has been a further consultation on the ‘Future of Building Control’. This session aims to bring up to date information on the current state of rules and regulations and where they are going.
